Informations.Information Text: Congrats, you answered all questions correctly. Please help MCME beeing a friendly place. You may now enter Middle-Earth, just follow the path across the water.

Questions.Question Text: Before you can enter Middle-Earth you have to do a quiz about the rules. You will find the rules at www.mcmiddleearth.com.

Answers.Text: You want to start now? Open chat with 't' and type in 'yes' or 'no'.

Questions.Success Text: When going on you will see a question and some possible answers. Press 't' and type in if they are correct.
Questions.Fail Text: Come back when you are ready to start the quiz.

Questions.Question Text: What are the rules about teamspeak?

Answers.Text: You may always play music on teamspeak.
You may play music only on appropriate channels on teamspeak.
You may play music only with staff permission on Teamspeak.
You may NOT play music on Teamspeak.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: What is in the rules for chat and forum?

Answers.Text: You may post links to screenshots of builds you made yourselve on a private map.
You may post links you made on other servers.
You may tell in chat about a cool other server you found.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: What is in the rules for chat and forum?

Answers.Text: You must allways use English.
You must use English in private chat messages.
You may use all languages in private forum conversations.
You may use all languages in public chat.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: What is in the rules for chat and forum?

Answers.Text: You may complain about the behaviour of an other player.
You may complain about a new law in your country.
You may discuss about the behaviour of fundamental christians in your town.
You may ask for a job in chat.
If a question of yours is not answered, try again by asking until you get an answer.
You may post links to videos showing high level of violence.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: What are the rules for building as an Adventurer?

Answers.Text: Building freely on the build world is allowed.
Building freely on the plotworld is allowed.
Building in Plotbuilds is allowed.
Building during jobs is allowed.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: Which Mods are allowed on MCME?

Answers.Text: You may only use official MCME Mods.
You may use Mods to show an ingame map.
You may use fly Mods.
You may use speed Mods.
You may use mods to enhance quality like Optifine and Shaders.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.

Questions.Question Text: What is the rule about your forum name?

Answers.Text: Your forum name must be Middle-Earth related.
Your forum name must be your MC ingame name.
Your forum name must be your real name.
Choose it freely.

Questions.Success Text: You know the rule, go ahead.
Questions.Fail Text: Well, that was wrong, try again.
